article.name: Is connectivity monitoring available for managed services like Amazon RDS?
article.title: Is connectivity monitoring available for managed services like Amazon RDS?
article.body:
• Managed services such as Amazon RDS cannot be monitored with the Connectivity monitoring rule.
  • As an alternative method, we recommend that you check whether the host on which the agent is installed can connect to the managed service using a plugin like the following.
    • check-tcp
      • Confirm whether or not you can connect to the TCP port of the target managed service
      • See Running checks on TCP servers - Mackerel Help for more information
  • There are also check plugins that specialize in various middleware and protocols. Consider the following according to your target managed service (consult the README of each plugin for details)
    • check-mysql
    • check-postgresql
    • check-redis
    • check-http
    • check-smtp
